title: Global Day Of CodeRetreat 2016 - Oxford, UK
description:
When it comes to practicing and mastering programming skills, it’s not practice that makes perfect, but perfect practice that makes perfect. That is the thinking behind the Code Retreat, which provides developers with the opportunity to take part in focused practice. The aim, for attendees, is to learn, practice and master coding techniques with the express intent of becoming better at their craft, and improving their ability to produce high-quality product. 
 
Please register yourself here: 
 
 https://www.meetup.com/Agile-Software-Development-Oxfordshire/events/234142930/
